entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 a.m. ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy with risk of a thundershower. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
